pr_title: fix an issue with discovering hyperlinks in test consoles

timeline.message: fix an issue with discovering hyperlinks in test consoles

timeline.bodyText: DartRelativePathsConsoleFilter is intended to be used in test environs. Are you sure deleting it is the right thing to do?
timeline.author: stevemessick

replies.bodyText: No, I'll add it back in, and add some brief docs about what the different filters do.
replies.author: devoncarew

timeline.bodyText: I think you want DartConsoleFilter here, too, but it may be getting added at a later stage. I forgot just how convoluted this is.
timeline.author: stevemessick

replies.bodyText: We may just need the DartConsoleFilter in the SdkRunConfig.java (the run/debug console)? If you're certain I can add it, but would otherwise hold off.
replies.author: devoncarew

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure you want to remove this? It has some specialized logic for handling Flutter stuff, like plugins.
timeline.author: stevemessick

replies.bodyText: I'll figure out what all the FlutterConsoleFilter is responsible for. I think it's more important for the run console (to link to lib.main.dart, and some flutter doctor output?). It may have several different concerns in that class.
replies.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: I added docs to FlutterConsoleFilter. I think we only want to use it for the run and debug consoles.
replies.author: devoncarew

timeline.message: add the DartRelativePathsConsoleFilter filter to the bazel test config; add docs
